Name: 그 어느 여름날의 이야기
About the game: A person who came to Earth. There's only one chance to go back! Choi Won-jin, an elite college student at K University, came to the rural village one day with an unknown reason. Having a false identity and name, he bickers with Lee Hyun-ji, a native of the village, and lives a pleasant daily life. Then one day, Lee Yoo-jin, called the empress of the empire, came to Earth with an accident of fire. Let's get started.
